name: Cityfurnish
headline: Cityfurnish - Commitment-free furniture rentals for a better you!
description: Cityfurnish is a rental subscription service for furniture and appliances in India. Today, there are 350M people renting unfurnished or semi-furnished apartments in India; Cityfurnish provides an easy, affordable and hassle-free solution. The founding team shares 25+ years of furniture retailing experience and has grown the business to 8,000+ subscribers.

founders.name: Neerav Jain, Founder
founders.description:
Neerav Jain is the founder & CEO of CityFurnish.
Cityfurnish is India's leading furniture & appliances rental subscription brand.

generated_description:
Cityfurnish is revolutionizing the way people think about furniture and appliance ownership in India. Founded in 2015 in New Delhi, this innovative company takes an approach that combines convenience with affordability. In a country where 350 million people reside in rental homes, Cityfurnish provides a hassle-free option for those looking to furnish their spaces without the heavy investment typically associated with purchasing furniture.

**What They Do**: Cityfurnish offers commitment-free furniture and appliance rentals tailored to fit various lifestyles. They cater to students, professionals, and families, allowing them to rent high-quality furniture for durations as short as three months and as long as a year. This flexibility is particularly appealing to young professionals and migrants who often change residences.

**Key Features**:
- **Affordability**: Renting from Cityfurnish is significantly cheaper than buying, allowing customers to enjoy stylish living without hefty expenses.
- **Convenience**: The entire rental process can be managed online—choose your items, sign up, and receive your furniture at home within 72 hours. Delivery and installation are included.
- **Quality Assured**: With a range of over 300 designs, all items are vetted for quality, making it easy to have a tastefully decorated space.

As a graduate of Y Combinator’s Batch W19, the founding team brings 25+ years of experience in the furniture retailing industry. With a robust team of about 90 employees, Cityfurnish has already gained over 200,000 satisfied subscribers and consistently maintains a high customer rating of 4.6 stars.

**Promotions & Offers**: Cityfurnish frequently runs promotions, such as 30% off your first order with the code RENT30, enticing new users to experience their services.

The company not only focuses on home users but also extends its offerings to businesses looking for bulk rental solutions—making Cityfurnish a one-stop shop for all your furnishing needs. 

### Summary
Cityfurnish is reshaping the rental market in India by offering an affordable, flexible, and easy way to furnish homes and offices without the burdens associated with ownership. Whether you’re a student, a professional, or a family in transition, they’ve got the right furniture solution for you. For more information, check out their website at [Cityfurnish.com](https://cityfurnish.com/).
